articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: Astell & Kern’s $1,799 music player lets you switch between DACs - The Verge
articles.description: The A&futura SE200 is a $1,799 digital audio player which includes both ESS and AKM DACs, both of which have their own circuits tailored to their individual sounds. You can switch between them to pick your preferred sound.
articles.content: A world first, the company says
